name: serverest-k6-performance
description: Performance tests for ServeRest API using k6

scripts.test: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/index.js --vus 5 --duration 30s
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/index.js --vus 1 --duration 10s
scripts.test:load: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/index.js --vus 10 --duration 1m
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/index.js --vus 50 --duration 5m
scripts.test:spike: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/index.js --vus 100 --ramp-up 10s --duration 1m
scripts.test:soak: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/index.js --vus 20 --duration 30m
scripts.test:users: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/users.spec.js --vus 5 --duration 30s
scripts.test:products: npm run build && k6 run dist/tests/products.spec.js --vus 5 --duration 30s
scripts.test:report: npm run build && npm run test -- --out json=test-results/results.json && npm run report:generate
scripts.test:report:smoke: npm run build && npm run test:smoke -- --out json=test-results/results-smoke.json && npm run report:generate-smoke
scripts.test:report:load: npm run build && npm run test:load -- --out json=test-results/results-load.json && npm run report:generate-load
scripts.test:report:stress: npm run build && npm run test:stress -- --out json=test-results/results-stress.json && npm run report:generate-stress
scripts.test:report:soak: npm run build && npm run test:soak -- --out json=test-results/results-soak.json && npm run report:generate-soak
scripts.test:all: npm run test:report:smoke && npm run test:report:load && npm run test:report:stress
